column4: whats the default cd-recording application with a ubuntu install?
running gnome
gnomebaker or graveman
thanks, what one do you prefer?
for disc -> disc backups
neither, I like both
lol, ok.  What one do you think i should start with, for disc -> disc backups
thanks
do you hear system sounds..?
do you have multiple sound cards (like a built-in one and a real card)
nope, just a built in one.  On my previous distro I used the snd_via82xx module, with alsa
hmm, what does amixer say?
not a whole lot, everything appears to be fine
alsamixer notices my card as a VIA 8237 correctly
aha, is it muted in any way..?
doesn't look like it.  'mute' in a terminal is not found... not a command
in alsamixer you can see it...
try: mpg321 -o esd
ubuntu uses esd, so mpg321 needs to be told to use esd
same results with -o esd
ok: what does lsof | grep /dev/dsp say?
